member.summary: Gets or sets the number of seconds to wait after the call is initiated in the functional test.

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of seconds to wait after the DTMF sequence is completed in the functional test.

member.summary: Gets or sets the SID of the call resource (updated after InitateCallFunctionalTest).

member.summary: Gets or sets the status of the call resource (updated after CheckCallProgressTest).

member.name: P:Microsoft.AdvocacyPlatform.Functions.FunctionalTests.TestConfiguration.RecordingUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the recording URI of the call recording (updated after PullRecordingFunctionalTest).

member.name: P:Microsoft.AdvocacyPlatform.Functions.FunctionalTests.TestConfiguration.AllRecordingsDeleted
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all recordings for a call were deleted (updated after DeleteRecordingsFunctionalTest).

member.name: P:Microsoft.AdvocacyPlatform.Functions.FunctionalTests.TestConfiguration.AllAccountRecordingsDeleted
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all recordings for an account were deleted (updated after DeleteAccountRecordingsFunctionalTest).

member.name: P:Microsoft.AdvocacyPlatform.Functions.FunctionalTests.TestConfiguration.Transcript
member.summary: Gets or sets the transcript of the recording (updated after TranscribeCallFunctionalTest).

member.name: P:Microsoft.AdvocacyPlatform.Functions.FunctionalTests.TestConfiguration.Data
member.summary: Gets or sets the transcription data returned (updated after ExtractInfoFunctionalTest).

member.name: P:Microsoft.AdvocacyPlatform.Functions.FunctionalTests.TestConfiguration.ExpectedEntities
member.summary: Gets or sets the entities expected to be extracted from the transcription (Date, Location, and/or Person).

member.name: P:Microsoft.AdvocacyPlatform.Functions.FunctionalTests.TestConfiguration.ExpectedAdditionalEntities
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional entities collection expected to be returned by the data extractor.

member.summary: Gets or sets the callback URL to send results to (only used with SendResultFunctionalTest).
